price: په تختونو به هلته تكيه وهلي ناست وي، نه به د لمر ګرمي پكې ويني او نه (د ژمي) ساړه.
arabic: مُّتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا عَلَى ٱلۡأَرَآئِكِۖ لَا يَرَوۡنَ فِيهَا شَمۡسٗا وَلَا زَمۡهَرِيرٗا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: muttakiīna fīhā ʿalā al-arāiki lā yarawna fīhā shamsan walā zamharīran
